Module com.trinhdin.rpg
Package com.trinhdin.rpg.controller

Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
com.trinhdin.rpg.controller.GameScreen
public class GameScreen extends Object
GameScreen class main controller of the game It handles the game loop and create view of the game
